column4: Hey. I have a Broadcom BCM4306/2 wifi card, and I installed the b43legacy driver to get it working. However, it's super slow, and I keep getting the error message in dmesg: "b43legacy-phy0 ERROR: PHY transmission error". Any ideas?
Note, I have googled and nothing has worked.
does it have a bluetooth button/switch/fn key combo on it?
